ComicInfo.Summary:
"Chasing Phantoms" Part 4! The war between the Street Phantoms and the Foot Clan comes to a shocking conclusion, and only one will remain when the dust settles! The Turtles will test their limits in a shocking finale!
A long-lasting story shift begins here!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Dave Wachter | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Tomi Varga (c) | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Edwin Huang | 3 | RE | Eastman Fan Club Edition Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman | 4 | Note: The digital edition (11/16/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
